import React from 'react' export default function Home(props) { let CompanyDetails = []; if(props.getCompanyDetails) { props.getCompanyDetails.map((value, key) => ( CompanyDetails['CompanyName'] = value.companyName, CompanyDetails['CompanyAddress'] = value.companyAddress, CompanyDetails['CompanyAddressLink'] = value.companyAddressLink, CompanyDetails['CompanyPhone'] = value.companyPhone, CompanyDetails['CompanyFacebook'] = value.companyFacebook, CompanyDetails['CompanyTwitter'] = value.companyTwitter, CompanyDetails['CompanyInstagram'] = value.companyInstagram, CompanyDetails['CompanyLinkedin'] = value.companyLinkedin )); } return ( <>

All Courses

{ props.getCourse && props.getCourse.map((value, key) => (

{value.cName}

{value.cDetail.slice(0, 150)}

))}
) }
